post.body: what a great idea! how do you do that?

snow snow snow! hoping it lasts longer than 10 minutes and doesn't turn to freezing rain.

helpful gmail recycling tip: "You can make a lovely hat out of previously-used aluminum foil" they forgot to add it'll ward off aliens too
